LightningComponentBundle.description: Unified phone control panel with telephony controls and integrated hold timer for Voice Call records

property.name: debugMode
property.label: Debug Mode
property.description: Enable debug information display for troubleshooting

property.name: toolbarBackgroundColor
property.label: Toolbar Background Color
property.description: Background color for the call control toolbar (CSS color value, e.g., #1a1a1a, rgba(0,0,0,0.9), or hsl(0,0%,10%))

property.name: toolbarStyle
property.label: Toolbar Style
property.description: Visual style for the call control toolbar (modern=dark gradient, classic=solid dark, minimal=light, custom=uses custom color)
